plugin_info.plugin_description: A cut-down version of the CSV import plugin, which imports a network saved in a set of CSV files into Hydra.
plugin_info.plugin_epilog: Written by Stephen Knox (stephen.knox@manchester.ac.uk) (c) Copyright 2013, University College London. For more information visit www.hydra-network.com

arg.name: nodes
arg.help: One or multiple files containing nodes and attributes.

arg.name: links
arg.help: One or multiple files containing information on links.

arg.name: session_id
arg.help: Specify the session ID for the connection. If not specified, the plugin will try to connect based on the credentials it finds in config

arg.name: server_url
arg.help: The url of the server to connect to if not using the default
